info.name: Jibril (NoGameNoLife) - Relics of Avabur
info.description:
A simple theme for the browser-based game, Relics of Avabur.

You must have the Classic theme selected in Account Management in order to use this theme.
info.additionalInfo: Credit to Reltorakii (edvordo) for his Relics of Avabur - Rewamped themes. If it were not for his code, I wouldn't have been able to figure out how to do this. Made for AshenSwift.
